description.title: This TC#00001 uses loop (100 times) login for admin to verify there is no broken page (according to issue #5154).
description.steps: 1. Login with valid data. 1.1 If Login page is broken -> take Screenshot. 2. Click logout button.

description.title: This TC#00005 uses loop (100 times) login for agent to verify there is no broken stage in the AgentDesktop Tab (according to the issue #5187).
description.steps: 1. Login with valid data. 2. Switch to AgentDesktop Tab. 3. Verify text "Welcome!" is present. 4. Click logout button.

description.title: This TC#00002 verify that Agent can Login.
description.steps: 1. Login with valid data. 2. Choose group. 3. Click continue. 4. Verify "call button" is visible. 5. Verify "Logged in as:" (this group, this user). 6. Click logout button.

description.title: This TC#00003 verify that Admin can Login.
description.steps: 1. Login with valid data. 2. Click admin panel. 3. Verify URL contains "admin". 4. Click logout button.

description.title: This TC#00004 verify that Agent can call
description.steps: 1. Login with valid data. 2. Choose group. 3. Click continue. 4. Set up phone number. 5. Click call button. 6. Wait... 7. Click hangup button 8. Wait... 9. Click logout button. 10. Wait...

description.title: This TC#00007 verifies that Agent cannot Login with invalid credentials, error message is shown
description.steps: 1. Login with invalid data. 2. Click connect. 3. Error message should be shown.

description.title: This TC#00009 verifies that Agent can call via Keypad
description.steps: 1. Login with valid data. 2. Choose group. 3. Click continue. 4. Set up phone number via Keypad. 5. Click call button. 6. Wait... 7. Click hangup button 8. Wait... 9. Click logout button. 10. Wait...
